Indent a printout

Source: R/printr.R
indent_print.Rd

Indent a printout

Usage

indent_print(..., .indent = " ", .printer = print)

Arguments

...

Passed to the printing function.

.indent

Character scalar, indent the printout with this.

.printer

The printing function, defaults to print.

Value

The first element in ..., invisibly.

On this page
